mapper.select: SELECT e.*, d.name as department_name, p.name as position_name FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.id LEFT JOIN position p ON e.position_id = p.id WHERE e.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE status != 'resigned' ORDER BY emp_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (emp_no, name, gender, phone, email, id_card, birthday, address, department_id, position_id, entry_date, leave_date, status, create_time) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{idCard}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{departmentId}, #{positionId}, #{entryDate}, #{leaveDate}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee WHERE department_id = #{departmentId} AND status != 'resigned'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee WHERE position_id = #{positionId} AND status != 'resigned'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee WHERE status = #{status}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee WHERE status != 'resigned'
